title: Online Clinical Practice Module for Neck Pain Management

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational anatomy, clinical assessment experience, and instructional design basics
context.additional_context: Practice-based education utilizing interactive modules in a digital-device-provided environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply evidence-based neck pain management guidelines to three or more clinical scenarios
Learners will be able to plan learner-customized educational designs using interactive features of online modules
Learners can analyze and report the educational utility of developed instructional tools from three perspectives through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
